title: "self v between decoys"
author: colin combe
output: html_notebook
---

```{r eval=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(ggthemes)
library(ggsci)
library(reshape2)
library(plotly)
library(ggExtra)
library(egg)
library(svglite)
```


```{r}
CLMS_scores <- read.csv("./OCCMscores.csv")
h<- ggplot(CLMS_scores, aes(Score, fill=Self )) +geom_histogram(binwidth=0.1)
h
```


```{r}
h_log<- ggplot(CLMS_scores, aes(log(Score), fill=Self )) +geom_histogram(binwidth=0.1)
h_log
```

```{r}
d_log<- ggplot(CLMS_scores, aes(log(Score), fill=Self)) +geom_density(alpha = 0.4)
d_log
```


```{r}
d_log + facet_wrap(~DecoyType, ncol=1)
```

all decoys

```{r}
TD_only <- CLMS_scores[CLMS_scores$DecoyType != 'TT',]
d_TD <- ggplot(TD_only, aes(log(Score), fill=Self)) +geom_density(alpha = 0.4)
d_TD
```


```{r}
x=
TD_only[TD_only$Self
==
"TRUE",
 ]
y=
TD_only[TD_only$Self
==
"FALSE",
 ]
ks.test(x$Score, y$Score) 
```

K-S test: cannot reject Null Hypothesis (differences are random) if p-value > 0.05
